resources.string: Hotel with pool and near to a shopping mall

Malibú Hotel has rooms that are perfect for business people and to stay on vacations, it offers a unique experience for the guests, it has big outside spaces, WiFi and audio systems, enjoy our reataurants, La Guaquería offers international food and Parrilla y Bar has a diverse menu of meat dishes.
Arawak plaza Hotel, placed in a night-life zone in Sincelejo, has proximity to many bars and restaurants, it has comfortable rooms at a very good price, also has business center and events rooms.
This hotel has 47 comfortable rooms, gym, pool, laundry and events rooms, also has proximity to VIVA Sincelejo mall, where you can go shopping, eat, go to movies and have fun.

The party reaches a higher level in Kantaleta Bar in Sincelejo, enjoy our variety of drinks and coctels, it has terrace, inner garden and a central saloon, there always are live music and an invited DJ.
Enjoy the best vallenato music in Wepaje Bar, the perfect place for vallenato lovers, each friday we have our famous parranda(vallenato music party) with discounts in all the drinks.

Come to Ruta 69 and enjoy the best rock music and the best variety of drinks in the city, our retro ambience will captivate you, don\'t forget the karaoke wednesdays, where you can win a lot of prizes.
Zaitun is a restaurant that offers a big variety of international food, it has a pleasant ambience and the menu includes dishes from more than 10 countries that will captivate your taste.
Arcanos is a gourmet restaurant with regional dishes with an exquisite gourmet style, also it has bar and a pleasant ambience to make your stay a good experience.
La Cajita is a restaurant and café with retro ambience, come and enjoy our variety of dishes, desserts, and coffee drinks.
